data.title: Plan Your Visit
data.meta_description: Everything you need to know to plan your visit to WICKED on Broadway including theatre information, directions, and more.
data.text:
Receive 15% off our best available rate as well as complimentary high speed Wi-Fi for video streaming. To book with the special rate, please click the link below. Proof of purchase of a Wicked ticket must be presented at check-in.

Learn More

Enjoy 10% off your dinner bill when you show your same-day WICKED tickets. Please note that a 20% gratuity will be added on the pre-discounted bill, and reservations are required.

Learn More

Receive 10% off your meal at Haswell Green’s when you show same-day WICKED tickets.

Learn More

Enjoy 10% off your meal at Schnipper’s when you show same-day WICKED tickets.

Learn More

Same-day WICKED ticket holders can save on parking. Click ‘Learn More’ to access a coupon, which must be printed prior to arrival.

Learn More

Enjoy 10% off your dinner bill when you show your same-day WICKED tickets. Please note that a 20% gratuity will be added on the pre-discounted bill, and reservations are required.

Learn More

Enjoy 10% off your meal at PS Kitchen when you show same-day WICKED tickets.

Learn More
